20110103222112.000|20110103222114.000|TR0|budget.  And as you saw Dana Bash

20110103225240.000|20110103225242.000|TR0|Arkansas as well.  An estimated 100,000 
20110103225242.000|20110103225244.000|TR0|drum fish floated to the surface of the 
20110103225244.000|20110103225246.000|TR0|Arkansas River near Ozark.  That's about 
20110103225246.000|20110103225248.000|TR0|125 miles west of the town of Beebe, where 
20110103225248.000|20110103225251.000|TR0|all those birds fell from the sky.

20110103225658.000|20110103225700.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT (voice-over): Distraught 
20110103225700.000|20110103225702.000|TR0|relatives search for victims of the New 
20110103225702.000|20110103225704.000|TR0|Year's bombing.
20110103225704.000|20110103225706.000|TR0|
20110103225706.000|20110103225709.000|TR0|In the nearby Marmokos (ph) hospital, law 
20110103225709.000|20110103225711.000|TR0|student Peter Sami recalls he just left 
20110103225711.000|20110103225713.000|TR0|midnight mass when the bomb went off.  
20110103225713.000|20110103225715.000|TR0|"There were bodies all over the ground," 
20110103225715.000|20110103225717.000|TR0|he recalls.  "I fell on top of them.  I 
20110103225717.000|20110103225720.000|TR0|got up and had to walk on top of more 
20110103225720.000|20110103225722.000|TR0|bodies to get back into the church."
20110103225722.000|20110103225724.000|TR0|
20110103225724.000|20110103225726.000|TR0|Still in shock, store owner Musab Shada 
20110103225726.000|20110103225728.000|TR0|(ph) suffered burns to his legs and face.  
20110103225728.000|20110103225731.000|TR0|He struggles to maintain his composure as 
20110103225731.000|20110103225733.000|TR0|the nurses attend to him.
20110103225733.000|20110103225735.000|TR0|
20110103225735.000|20110103225737.000|TR0|In the intensive care unit, 4-year-old 
20110103225737.000|20110103225739.000|TR0|Karin Bulas' (ph) relatives are trying to 
20110103225739.000|20110103225742.000|TR0|distract her with snacks and sweets.  In 
20110103225742.000|20110103225744.000|TR0|addition to second- degree burns to her 
20110103225744.000|20110103225746.000|TR0|face, shrapnel tore into her legs.
20110103225746.000|20110103225748.000|TR0|
20110103225748.000|20110103225750.000|TR0|Christian/Muslim tensions have been rising 
20110103225750.000|20110103225753.000|TR0|here in recent years. Members of the 
20110103225753.000|20110103225755.000|TR0|Coptic Christian minority, which makes up 
20110103225755.000|20110103225757.000|TR0|around 10 percent of the population, have 
20110103225757.000|20110103225759.000|TR0|long complained of discrimination at the 
20110103225759.000|20110103225801.000|TR0|hands of the Muslim majority.
20110103225801.000|20110103225804.000|TR0|
20110103225804.000|20110103225806.000|TR0|Sameh al-Khatib and his brothers were in 
20110103225806.000|20110103225808.000|TR0|their grocery store when they heard the 
20110103225808.000|20110103225810.000|TR0|blast.  "Moments later," he recalls, "a 
20110103225810.000|20110103225813.000|TR0|mob seemed to appear out of nowhere, 
20110103225813.000|20110103225815.000|TR0|rushing down the street, attacking and 
20110103225815.000|20110103225817.000|TR0|ransacking Christian-owned stores and 
20110103225817.000|20110103225819.000|TR0|properties."  He protected himself with an 
20110103225819.000|20110103225821.000|TR0|empty soft drink case.
20110103225821.000|20110103225824.000|TR0|
20110103225824.000|20110103225826.000|TR0|Up the street, angry Christians chant, "We 
20110103225826.000|20110103225828.000|TR0|want our rights!" and then try to break 
20110103225828.000|20110103225830.000|TR0|through the police cordon to reach the 
20110103225830.000|20110103225832.000|TR0|church.
20110103225832.000|20110103225835.000|TR0|
20110103225835.000|20110103225837.000|TR0|(on camera):  The church is now surrounded 
20110103225837.000|20110103225839.000|TR0|by security.  Hardly anybody is allowed 
20110103225839.000|20110103225841.000|TR0|near it.  And that's the problem, many of
